page.title: 20WHITBOURNE SCHOOL TODAY
page.content: through magnifying glassesand studied their behaviour.Then more information was found in our many library books. {History and geography}are studied usually through the local environment.We are lucky to have the River Teme nearby and the village is rich in history.We look for clues about past life in the village and study the land around us. We use our{computer}every day.We have lots of programmes to help us with mathematics and language work.Our favourite programme at the moment is Granny's Garden.
